title: Enchanting Diamond Floral Pendant - Modern Mangalsutra Taali
materials: 18K Rose Gold setting. Features meticulously set sparkling round brilliant cut diamonds. Excellent cut
VS clarity diamonds. Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Delicate floral design crafted with intricate diamond setting. The pendant features five floral motifs connected in a gentle curve. The two side motifs have a teardrop design that creates a traditional yet modern look for the pendant. The top features tear-drop style loops for chain attachment
colors: Rose gold with brilliant white diamonds.
occasions: Karwa Chauth (if worn as a Mangalsutra)
description: This dazzling pendant represents a modern take on the traditional Taali, also known as Mangalsutra pendant, offering a blend of cultural significance with contemporary style. Its delicate floral design and glittering diamonds make it a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting brilliance, making it a cherished heirloom.
